metadata.name: Ep.1: #rektguysummer
metadata.description:
Collector's airdrop #1.

3D/AR files to use with your phone:

GoogleDrive link:  
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1GkD7p_0cvescF-KccKqhRgBmaje1j9xp?usp=sharing

IPFS link (slower loading):  
https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmTCu9SS6B1pH3b38eLx8oCPTnp8s3ASW2vaUtz2U11ZhU

For iPhone: download the file from the iPhone folder and just open the file.

For Android: download the file from the Android folder and open it with an Augmented Reality app (e.g. AR Viewer) from the Play Store.
